document.full_text: a former japanese prime minister joined the swelling ranks of ruling party rebels trying to oust leader naoto kan, raising the risk that a no-confidence vote will pass in parliament on thursday, forcing him to quit.
document.title: japan pm faces party rebellion ahead of confidence vote
lines_and_colors: a former japanese prime minister joined the swelling ranks of ruling party rebels trying to oust leader naoto kan, raising the risk that a no-confidence vote will pass in parliament on thursday, forcing him to quit.
